snippet: Fei Teng, 42, of Queens, was arrested after the authorities said a soy sauce container he had filled with gasoline ignited at a restaurant in Manhattan, starting a blaze that severely injured three people.
abstract: Fei Teng, 42, of Queens, was arrested after the authorities said a soy sauce container he had filled with gasoline ignited at a restaurant in Manhattan, starting a blaze that severely injured three people.

headline.main: Chef Charged in Fire at Restaurant
